long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Join the Paytogreen community and fund green projects by shopping online with the Paytogreen Chrome extension.

Shop and receive green funds at over 4,000 online stores.

Our Paytogreen browser extension is the hassle-free green funding tool that helps you:

1.Raise green funds

Shop directly from your favourite stores and we'll let you know when you land on one of our partners. Youâ€™ll never miss a chance to raise green funds again.

2. Access your account

Get direct access to your green fund via the Chrome extension

3. Browse our partners

You'll be able to navigate to our site quickly and easily at any time to browse all Paytogreen partners.
